messages.content: liste moi les √©quipements qui sont sortis en dehors de la france cette derni√®re semaine

**üìä Data Results:**

[TABLE_DATA_PLACEHOLDER]

**üîç Key Insights:**

‚Ä¢ **Dataset Size:** 1,000 records across 1 columns

‚Ä¢ **a.IMEI:** 1000 unique values

**‚ö° Executed Query:**

```sql
SELECT DISTINCT a.IMEI
FROM RM_AGGREGATED_DATA a
JOIN RM_AGGREGATED_DATA b ON a.IMEI = b.IMEI
JOIN PLMN pa ON a.PLMN = pa.PLMN
JOIN PLMN pb ON b.PLMN = pb.PLMN
WHERE pa.COUNTRY_ISO3 = 'FRA' AND pb.COUNTRY_ISO3 != 'FRA' AND a.RECORD_OPENING_TIME < b.RECORD_OPENING_TIME AND a.RECORD_OPENING_TIME >= now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY
LIMIT 1000
```

give me the top 10 clients by number of tickets

**üìä Data Results:**

[TABLE_DATA_PLACEHOLDER]

**üîç Key Insights:**

‚Ä¢ **Dataset Size:** 10 records across 2 columns

‚Ä¢ **NAME:** 10 unique values

‚Ä¢ **ticket_count:** Range 51.4M - 940.3M, Avg 241.7M

‚Ä¢ **Range:** From STELLANTIS to YUNEX TRAFFIC AUSTRIA GMBH

**‚ö° Executed Query:**

```sql
SELECT CUSTOMER.NAME, COUNT(*) AS ticket_count
FROM RM_AGGREGATED_DATA
JOIN CUSTOMER ON RM_AGGREGATED_DATA.PARTY_ID = CUSTOMER.PARTY_ID
GROUP BY CUSTOMER.NAME
ORDER BY ticket_count DESC
LIMIT 10
```

listes moi les 10 clients qui ont g√©n√©r√©s le plus de tickets

**üìä Data Results:**

[TABLE_DATA_PLACEHOLDER]

**üîç Key Insights:**

‚Ä¢ **Dataset Size:** 10 records across 2 columns

‚Ä¢ **customer_name:** 10 unique values

‚Ä¢ **ticket_count:** Range 17.2M - 346.2M, Avg 84.0M

‚Ä¢ **Range:** From STELLANTIS to TRANSICS FRANCE

**‚ö° Executed Query:**

```sql
SELECT c.NAME as customer_name, COUNT(*) as ticket_count
FROM RM_AGGREGATED_DATA r
JOIN CUSTOMER c ON r.PARTY_ID = c.PARTY_ID
WHERE r.RECORD_OPENING_TIME >= toDateTime(toDate(now()) - INTERVAL 7 DAY)
GROUP BY c.NAME
ORDER BY ticket_count DESC
LIMIT 10
```

Quel est le nombre de tickets g√©n√©r√©s hier entre 14h00 et 14h30 par le client LYRA NETWORK r√©parti par offre tarifaire ? donne moi le r√©sultat en pie chart

**üìä Data Results:**

[TABLE_DATA_PLACEHOLDER]

**üîç Key Insights:**

‚Ä¢ **Dataset Size:** 7 records across 2 columns

‚Ä¢ **offer_tariff:** 7 unique values

‚Ä¢ **percentage:** Range 0 - 59, Avg 14

‚Ä¢ **Range:** From LYRA_EU2 to LYRA7

**‚ö° Executed Query:**

```sql
SELECT rd.OFFER_CODE AS offer_tariff, COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM RM_AGGREGATED_DATA rd
JOIN CUSTOMER cs ON rd.PARTY_ID = cs.PARTY_ID
WHERE cs.NAME = 'LYRA NETWORK' AND rd.RECORD_OPENING_TIME >= toDateTime(toDate(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)) + INTERVAL 14 HOUR AND rd.RECORD_OPENING_TIME < toDateTime(toDate(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)) + INTERVAL 14 HOUR + INTERVAL 30 MINUTE) AS percentage
FROM RM_AGGREGATED_DATA rd
JOIN CUSTOMER cs ON rd.PARTY_ID = cs.PARTY_ID
WHERE cs.NAME = 'LYRA NETWORK' AND rd.RECORD_OPENING_TIME >= toDateTime(toDate(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)) + INTERVAL 14 HOUR AND rd.RECORD_OPENING_TIME < toDateTime(toDate(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)) + INTERVAL 14 HOUR + INTERVAL 30 MINUTE
GROUP BY rd.OFFER_CODE
ORDER BY percentage DESC
LIMIT 100
```

**üìà Chart Generated:**

[CHART_DISPLAY_PLACEHOLDER]

**üìÅ Downloads:**

[DOWNLOAD_BUTTONS_PLACEHOLDER]

*‚è±Ô∏è Processed in 10.85 seconds*

‚Ä¢ **percentage:** Range 0 - 59, Avg 14

‚Ä¢ **Range:** From LYRA7 to LYRA_EU2

**‚ö° Executed Query:**

FROM RM_AGGREGATED_DATA
JOIN CUSTOMER ON RM_AGGREGATED_DATA.PARTY_ID = CUSTOMER.PARTY_ID
WHERE CUSTOMER.NAME = 'LYRA NETWORK' AND RECORD_OPENING_TIME >= toDateTime(toDate(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)) + INTERVAL 14 HOUR AND RECORD_OPENING_TIME < toDateTime(toDate(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)) + INTERVAL 14 HOUR + INTERVAL 30 MINUTE) AS percentage
FROM RM_AGGREGATED_DATA
JOIN CUSTOMER ON RM_AGGREGATED_DATA.PARTY_ID = CUSTOMER.PARTY_ID
WHERE CUSTOMER.NAME = 'LYRA NETWORK' AND RECORD_OPENING_TIME >= toDateTime(toDate(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)) + INTERVAL 14 HOUR AND RECORD_OPENING_TIME < toDateTime(toDate(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)) + INTERVAL 14 HOUR + INTERVAL 30 MINUTE

donnes moi l'√©volution mensuelle de nombre de tickets du client STELLANTIS pour l'ann√©e 2025

**üìä Data Results:**

[TABLE_DATA_PLACEHOLDER]

**üîç Key Insights:**

‚Ä¢ **Dataset Size:** 2 records across 2 columns

‚Ä¢ **month:** 2 unique values

‚Ä¢ **ticket_count:** Range 451.7M - 536.4M, Avg 494.0M

‚Ä¢ **Range:** From 2025-06-01 to 2025-07-01

**‚ö° Executed Query:**

```sql
SELECT toStartOfMonth(RECORD_OPENING_TIME) AS month, COUNT(*) AS ticket_count
FROM RM_AGGREGATED_DATA
JOIN CUSTOMER ON RM_AGGREGATED_DATA.PARTY_ID = CUSTOMER.PARTY_ID
WHERE CUSTOMER.NAME = 'STELLANTIS' AND RECORD_OPENING_TIME >= toDateTime('2025-01-01 00:00:00') AND RECORD_OPENING_TIME < toDateTime('2026-01-01 00:00:00')
GROUP BY toStartOfMonth(RECORD_OPENING_TIME)
ORDER BY month
LIMIT 100
```

**üìä Data Results:**

[TABLE_DATA_PLACEHOLDER]

**üîç Key Insights:**

‚Ä¢ **Dataset Size:** 25 records across 2 columns

‚Ä¢ **date:** 25 unique values

‚Ä¢ **ticket_count:** Range 3.7M - 55.9M, Avg 39.5M

‚Ä¢ **Range:** From 2025-06-10 to 2025-07-10

**‚ö° Executed Query:**

```sql
SELECT toDate(RECORD_OPENING_TIME) as date, COUNT(*) as ticket_count
FROM RM_AGGREGATED_DATA
JOIN CUSTOMER ON RM_AGGREGATED_DATA.PARTY_ID = CUSTOMER.PARTY_ID
WHERE CUSTOMER.NAME = 'STELLANTIS' AND RECORD_OPENING_TIME >= toDate(toStartOfYear(toDate('2025-01-01'))) AND RECORD_OPENING_TIME < toDate(toStartOfYear(toDate('2026-01-01')))
GROUP BY date
LIMIT 365
```

tu peux me donner la r√©partition g√©ographique en pourcentage des tickets par pays sur les deux derni√®res journ√©es ? Tu te limiteras au 10 premiers r√©sultats

**üìä Data Results:**

[TABLE_DATA_PLACEHOLDER]

**üîç Key Insights:**

‚Ä¢ **Dataset Size:** 10 records across 2 columns

‚Ä¢ **COUNTRY_ISO3:** 10 unique values

‚Ä¢ **percentage:** Range 0 - 72, Avg 9

‚Ä¢ **Range:** From FRA to AUT

**‚ö° Executed Query:**

```sql
SELECT PLMN.COUNTRY_ISO3, COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM RM_AGGREGATED_DATA
WHERE toDate(RECORD_OPENING_TIME) BETWEEN toDate(now() - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AND toDate(now())) AS percentage
FROM RM_AGGREGATED_DATA
JOIN PLMN ON RM_AGGREGATED_DATA.PLMN = PLMN.PLMN
WHERE toDate(RECORD_OPENING_TIME) BETWEEN toDate(now() - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AND toDate(now())
GROUP BY PLMN.COUNTRY_ISO3
ORDER BY percentage DESC
LIMIT 10
```

Quel est le nombre de tickets g√©n√©r√©s hier entre 14h00 et 14h30  pour le client LYRA NETWORK r√©parti par offre tarifaire ?

**üìä Data Results:**

[TABLE_DATA_PLACEHOLDER]

**üîç Key Insights:**

‚Ä¢ **Dataset Size:** 7 records across 2 columns

‚Ä¢ **OFFER_CODE:** 7 unique values

‚Ä¢ **ticket_count:** Range 32 - 36.9K, Avg 8.9K

‚Ä¢ **Range:** From LYRA7 to LYRA_EU2

**‚ö° Executed Query:**

```sql
SELECT rd.OFFER_CODE, COUNT(*) AS ticket_count
FROM RM_AGGREGATED_DATA AS rd
JOIN CUSTOMER AS c ON rd.PARTY_ID = c.PARTY_ID
WHERE c.NAME = 'LYRA NETWORK' AND rd.RECORD_OPENING_TIME >= toDateTime(toDate(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)) + INTERVAL 14 HOUR AND rd.RECORD_OPENING_TIME < toDateTime(toDate(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)) + INTERVAL 14 HOUR + INTERVAL 30 MINUTE
GROUP BY rd.OFFER_CODE
LIMIT 100
```
